# documentVisibleRect

**Instance Property**

The exposed rectangle of the clip view’s document view, in the document view’s own coordinate system.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var documentVisibleRect: NSRect { get }
```

## Discussion

Note that this rectangle doesn’t reflect the effects of any clipping that may occur above the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSClipView] itself. To get the portion of the document view that’s guaranteed to be visible, send it a `visibleRect` message.

## Accessing the Visible Portion

- **documentRect**: The rectangle defining the document view’s frame, adjusted to the size of the clip view if the document view is smaller.
